EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud.Reminde
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join today's webinar Smarter Service-to-Service Invocations with Spring Cloud with Josh Long. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, April 21, 2015 Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e733af9f45063cfc7790293195f9f0bd0> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 663 140 375 Thank you,
